<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n2ce68K28C1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/3dc3ffec223066107d1aa69e23599a2b/tumblr_inline_n2cebb3UJJ1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>The sport is war! Total war! When Kerbals are getting massacred! The final swing is not a drill! It’s how many Kerbals <strong>EnterElysium</strong> can kill!</p>

<p>Only <strong>EnterElysium</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1iepIua"><strong>World War K 2</strong></a> can allow us to (kind of) get away with Slayer references in this week’s Video Wednesdays. While the start of the “2nd” World War K series doesn’t feature much by way of the war, itself, it’s a beautiful cinematic setup for what’s to come.</p>

<p>Unfortunately this episode is not embeddable, so click <a href="http://bit.ly/1iepIua"><strong>HERE</strong></a> to watch.</p>

Wow! Great job EE, you really deserve this, and I don't think SQUAD could have made a better choice for this video! Congrats!

P.S. ([{First}])
Why isn't it embedded?
Glad you all like it!

You should post more !! We need famous youtubers on the forum more often !
Ooooo looking forward to watching that tonight!! We can finally see what the NAT are actually up to!

Alright, oldschool Machinima guy here who has been thinking of trying something with KSP for a while...

#1. List of mods?

#2. How much of this was done in KSP and how much had to be done in 3rd party animation programs?

I'm particularly curious about the lights on the warp ship, and the "Abrams" lens flares.
